apps.name: AnisFlix
apps.localizedDescription: AnisFlix est votre compagnon de streaming ultime. Regardez vos films, séries et chaînes TV préférés en haute qualité.

versions.localizedDescription: fix: resolve player compiler timeout and subtitle bugs, bump to v1.0.51 - Refactor CustomVideoPlayer to reduce complexity and fix Swift compiler timeout. - Remove redundant reload logic in PlayerViewModel that caused local playback resets. - Bump version to 1.0.51. - Update sidestore.json and public IPA.
